tables.link:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_link` (
  `link_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `parent_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `like_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `comment_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `share_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT '',
  `description` text,
  `story` text,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `modified_at` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `privacy_type` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_value` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_text` text,
  `people_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `place_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `place_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `provider_name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL,
  `origin_url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,
  `thumbnail_width` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
  `link_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT 'link',
  `thumbnail_height` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`link_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
